ygData.subject: Re: To The Battle!
ygData.msgSnippet: * Shadow Cat was terrified. how could she have them let find her and the others. Now, not only has she put her and Snow Tech in danger, she put her best friend

X-OriginalArrivalTime: 13 Dec 2000 22:22:56.0767 (UTC) FILETIME=[3E4368F0:01C06553]
From: "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@...>


* Shadow Cat was terrified. how could she have them let find her and the 
others. Now, not only has she put her and Snow Tech in danger, she put her 
best friend in it too. She felt crushed. Just hearing Iron Raptors orders 
and Prowls opinoin, she sighed and looked at the two bots with eyes that 
where on the verge of break-down. She knew that they didn't understand what 
danger they where in. She spoke to them in a voice that sounded throughout 
the small glade they where in.*

" you don't understand. They are following us, they have a lock on our 
sparks and will track us to the base, putting not only us 5 in danger, but 
the entire base and all of it's occupants. There has to be a way to divert 
them? There HAS to!"

8 She sank to her knees, the soft earth packing down under her weight, 
leaving a small impression. She searched her mind for all the information 
she had learned about them when she was there, looking over and over, trying 
to find something to give them time to get away and mabey, somehow, scramble 
their scanners so they couldn't find them.*
* Shadow Cat blinked suddenly, she sat up and grinned. It was so stupidly 
easy it was pathetic. She looked at Snow Tech*

" Can you rig-up a transmitting device that will scramble their scanners?"

* Snow Tech blinked and stepped back in suprise.*

" Uh, yeah. But what about their base?"

* She looked at Iron Raptor and Prowl.*

" You two go on ahead. We know the general direction, so we wont be lost."

* She stood up and walked over to Iron Raptor, handing her the quivering 
mass of fuzz, placing it directly into her hands and closing her fingers 
slightly around him.*

" Take care of him. He can't be hurt normally, but the creatures that are 
coming can. He is VERY special, so don't loose him. He is one of the most 
important things that me an' Snowy have right now, he's our future, so 
protect him with your life."

* She then turned away from them, surveying Snow Tech as he began to put 
together a minute scrambling device.*

" we will join you soon. The divice shouldn't disort your scanners, but if 
it does let us know so we can fix it so it doesn't."

* The little fuzzy kitten senced being switched hands,and wondered if he was 
safe yet. He peeked out from his fur showing only one humongous eye. He 
mewed and looked at Iron Raptor. He stretched out to the form of her hand, 
making himself comfortable.*

" Puurrrrrrrr."

* Snow Tech had finished the little device and held it proudly in the palm 
of his hand. He gave it to Shadow Cat who placed it in her belt. She then 
spread her wings of steel and grabbed Snow tech under the arm pits, lifting 
him off the ground. She growled at him. He really needs to go on a diet, she 
thought to herself and to him she said,*

" I can't wait till you've figured out your new body, i hope you have wings, 
'cause flying you around is a pain, literally! my back is killing me!"

* They gained altitude and where soon above the trees, looking out for the 
creachers. They seemed to be a ways off, about half a continent or so, so 
she and Snow Tech had lots of time, and more, thanks to the scrambling 
device. They headed the wdirection Iron Raptor had given her, keeping her 
scanners on. She didn't want to have anymore suprises for one day...*
